help.description: Finds out what games you could play together. Register your Steam ID first with `steamid` command.

letsplay.steam_account_missing: Looks like Steam ID is not registered by: {0}. I cannot find out which games you could play. Please, register your Steam ID with `steamid` command.
letsplay.random_death_switch: Well, it seems I didn't find a game fast enough. Sorry about that. Could you try again?
letsplay.games_without_info: Games which I couldn't find more info
letsplay.games_without_info_detailed: More details could not be fetched for these games. The reason could be temporary network issues. This list may contain single-player games.

help.description: Register your Steam ID for the bot. Your Steam ID is a number sequence.

help.title: Instructions
help.description: You have to mention me in your message, unless you send a private message. Any command that requires mentions of other users will not work via private messages!
